definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: The shrinkage of the base decreases by the proper dosage water reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 適宜用量的減水劑降低了基層材料的收縮量。

sentences.english: This platform can be pulled up when deciding to go for a swim.
sentences.chinese: 這個平臺在決定去游泳時還可以收縮起來。

sentences.english: Anaphylaxis, as discussed earlier in the week, may also present with bronchoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 如前討論所述，過敏反應也可出現支氣管收縮。

sentences.english: The cold constricts the blood vessels, immediately reducing puffiness.
sentences.chinese: 冷能收縮血管，立即減少浮腫。

sentences.english: All companies find themselves retrenching at some point.
sentences.chinese: 所有的公司都會在某個時刻發現他們正在收縮。

sentences.english: Steel and concrete have almost the same rate of contraction and expansion.
sentences.chinese: 鋼和混凝土有幾乎相同的收縮率和膨脹率。

sentences.english: To bend the arm at the elbow, the muscle at the front of the upper arm has to shorten and bunch up.
sentences.chinese: 要從肘部彎曲手臂，就要收縮上臂正面的肌肉。

sentences.english: Water contracts until its temperature reaches 4℃.
sentences.chinese: 直到水溫達到4℃時，水才停止收縮。

sentences.english: The hot metal contracts as it cools down.
sentences.chinese: 熱的金屬一冷下來就收縮。

sentences.english: Colourful pearls obtained under the processing conditions were featured by proper hardness and softness and low shrinkage.
sentences.chinese: 在此工藝條件下製得的彩珠口感適中，收縮率低。

sentences.english: Variation of afterload influenced not only early, but also late diastolic filling parameters.
sentences.chinese: 後負荷變化影響舒張早期及心房收縮期左室充盈。

sentences.english: It acts directly on vascular smooth muscle as a potent vasoconstrictor.
sentences.chinese: 它可直接對血管平滑肌作爲一種強有力的血管收縮劑。

sentences.english: The wine from Côtes de Bourg is quite tannic with strong aromas of red fruits.
sentences.chinese: 波爾山坡的葡萄酒就着強烈的果香而且收縮感強。

sentences.english: The worse left ventricular contractive function appeared.
sentences.chinese: 反映左室收縮功能降低。

sentences.english: The uterus contracted well with bleeding of 200ml, lst degree perineal was repaired.
sentences.chinese: 子宮收縮好，出血200毫升，會陰一度撕裂被修復。

sentences.english: As it contracts, it pulls on these tissues.
sentences.chinese: 睫狀肌一收縮，就拉動這些組織。

definition: (economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
